scripts.test-build: node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp styles.css main.js manifest.json example-vault/pixel-banner-example/.obsidian/plugins/pexels-banner
scripts.build: node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp styles.css main.js manifest.json example-vault/pixel-banner-example/.obsidian/plugins/pexels-banner && zip -r example-vault.zip example-vault
